A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Love how the director managed to inject a homage to Mary Poppins into the movie.  After they put all that effort into the character Maz in the first film\, guess they had to throw it into this movie.  A random pointless side quest that had absolutely no impact on the story\, complete with pointless additional characters.  A few major characters that seemed to be actually interesting and important in the first film unceremoniously snuffed.  The slowest and least interesting space battle ever rendered to film.  Hero: \"Why don't I just fly directly to the bad guys front door and knock - what could go wrong?\"  Some great performances by some very talented actors\, and some fantastic comic moments and beautiful scenery - but a horrendously flawed plot\, and lets face it a disastrously  inappropriate \"Marvel Cinematic Universe\" approach to the subject that just doesn't work.
